attributes.action: Dissolve the Government and allow the Monarchy to Rule the Country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current government have proved they are not capable of running the country. They care more for building their own wealth at the expense of the British Taxpayer. Cabinet reshuffles just move bad ministers around so the can wreck other departments. They don't understand the role of the department, they are just pen pushers who can't fill in their own tax returns. The Monarchy will care for their subjects, and listen to the advisors. The money saved from paying MPs and their expenses will pay for the Monarchy extra duties.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
